text.autoconfig.breakable.title: Breakable
text.autoconfig.breakable.option.enabled: When enabled, it will block you from breaking your items or tools when it is at 1 durability.
text.autoconfig.breakable.option.showNot: Determines if a notification should be displayed in the action bar.
text.autoconfig.breakable.option.shieldD: Shields take damage based on the attack they block, this setting is the minimum amount of durability required for the shield to be used.
modmenu.summaryTranslation.breakable: Prevents the player from using an item or tool that is at 1 durability.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.breakable: Prevents the player from using an item or tool that is at 1 durability.
